abstract.t: In light of the expiration of the primary RSA patent, it is proposedthat the RSA algorithm replace the DSS and Diffie-Hellman as the MUSTimplement algorithms in the S/MIME profile. This draft will describeonly the proposed changes to the S/MIME Version 3 Certificate HandlingRFC [SMIMEV3CERT], and the rest of that RFC will remain identical.
